mn143:3.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
mn143:3.3: Tena kho pana samayena anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito bāḷhagilāno.
mn143:3.4: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi:
mn143:3.5: “ehi tvaṃ, ambho purisa, yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkama;
mn143:3.6: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandāhi:
mn143:3.10: upasaṅkamitvā mama vacanena āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandāhi:
mn143:3.12: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandatī’ti.
mn143:3.14: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
mn143:4.1: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho so puriso anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa paṭissutvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn143:4.7: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi.
mn143:4.8: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho so puriso āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca:
mn143:4.10: So āyasmato sāriputtassa pāde sirasā vandati;
mn143:4.12: ‘sādhu kira, bhante, āyasmā sāriputto yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkamatu anukampaṃ upādāyā’”ti.
mn143:5.1: Atha kho āyasmā sāriputto nivāsetvā pattacīvaramādāya āyasmatā ānandena pacchāsamaṇena yena anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:5.3: Nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
mn143:5.5: Kacci te dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti;
mn143:6.1: “Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn143:6.2: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn143:6.4: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, balavā puriso tiṇhena sikharena muddhani abhimattheyya;
mn143:6.5: evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā vātā muddhani ūhananti.
mn143:6.6: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn143:6.7: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn143:6.9: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, balavā puriso daḷhena varattakhaṇḍena sīse sīsaveṭhaṃ dadeyya;
mn143:6.10: evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā sīse sīsavedanā.
mn143:6.11: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn143:6.12: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn143:6.14: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, dakkho goghātako vā goghātakantevāsī vā tiṇhena govikantanena kucchiṃ parikanteyya;
mn143:6.15: evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimattā vātā kucchiṃ parikantanti.
mn143:6.16: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn143:6.17: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn143:6.19: Seyyathāpi, bhante sāriputta, dve balavanto purisā dubbalataraṃ purisaṃ nānābāhāsu gahetvā aṅgārakāsuyā santāpeyyuṃ, samparitāpeyyuṃ;
mn143:6.20: evameva kho me, bhante sāriputta, adhimatto kāyasmiṃ ḍāho.
mn143:6.21: Na me, bhante sāriputta, khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ.
mn143:6.22: Bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti;
mn143:7.2: ‘na cakkhuṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhunissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.5: ‘na sotaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me sotanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.8: ‘na ghānaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me ghānanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.11: ‘na jivhaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me jivhānissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.14: ‘na kāyaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me kāyanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:7.17: ‘na manaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manonissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:8.2: ‘na rūpaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me rūpanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:8.10: na dhammaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me dhammanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:9.2: ‘na cakkhuviññāṇaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhuviññāṇanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:9.9: na manoviññāṇaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manoviññāṇanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:10.2: ‘na cakkhusamphassaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhusamphassanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:10.9: na manosamphassaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manosamphassanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:11.2: ‘na cakkhusamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me cakkhusamphassajāvedanānissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:11.9: na manosamphassajaṃ vedanaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me manosamphassajāvedanānissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:12.2: ‘na pathavīdhātuṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me pathavīdhātunissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:12.9: na viññāṇadhātuṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me viññāṇadhātunissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:13.2: ‘na rūpaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me rūpanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:13.8: na viññāṇaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me viññāṇanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:14.2: ‘na ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me ākāsānañcāyatananissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:14.7: na nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me nevasaññānāsaññāyatananissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:15.2: ‘na idhalokaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me idhalokanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:15.5: ‘na paralokaṃ upādiyissāmi, na ca me paralokanissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:15.8: ‘yampi me diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ pattaṃ pariyesitaṃ anupariyesitaṃ anucaritaṃ manasā tampi na upādiyissāmi, na ca me tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatī’ti.
mn143:16.1: Evaṃ vutte, anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati parodi, assūni pavattesi.
mn143:16.2: Atha kho āyasmā ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca:
mn143:16.3: “olīyasi kho tvaṃ, gahapati, saṃsīdasi kho tvaṃ, gahapatī”ti?
mn143:16.5: api ca me dīgharattaṃ satthā payirupāsito manobhāvanīyā ca bhikkhū;
mn143:16.6: na ca me evarūpī dhammī kathā sutapubbā”ti.
mn143:16.7: “Na kho, gahapati, gihīnaṃ odātavasanānaṃ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhāti;
mn143:16.8: pabbajitānaṃ kho, gahapati, evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātī”ti.
mn143:16.9: “Tena hi, bhante sāriputta, gihīnampi odātavasanānaṃ evarūpī dhammī kathā paṭibhātu.
mn143:16.10: Santi hi, bhante, kulaputtā apparajakkhajātikā, assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti;
mn143:17.1: Atha kho āyasmā ca sāriputto āyasmā ca ānando anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ iminā ovādena ovaditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkamiṃsu.
mn143:17.2: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko gahapati, acirapakkante āyasmante ca sāriputte āyasmante ca ānande, kālamakāsi tusitaṃ kāyaṃ upapajji.
mn143:17.3: Atha kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:17.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhagavantaṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn143:22.4: “samanuñño me satthā”ti bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyi.
mn143:23.1: Atha kho bhagavā tassā rattiyā accayena bhikkhū āmantesi:
mn143:23.2: “imaṃ, bhikkhave, rattiṃ aññataro devaputto abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇo kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yenāhaṃ tenupasaṅkami;
mn143:23.4: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho so devaputto maṃ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
mn143:28.2: ‘Samanuñño me satthā’ti maṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā tatthevantaradhāyī”ti.
mn143:29.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
mn143:29.2: “so hi nūna so, bhante, anāthapiṇḍiko devaputto bhavissati.
mn143:29.3: Anāthapiṇḍiko, bhante, gahapati āyasmante sāriputte abhippasanno ahosī”ti.
mn143:29.5: Yāvatakaṃ kho, ānanda, takkāya pattabbaṃ, anuppattaṃ taṃ tayā.
mn143:30.2: Attamano āyasmā ānando bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandīti.
